name: ONE (itch)
description:
One is a game for the Heart Jam 2018. The theme was scarecity. It was made in 72 hours.

You have only one bullet and also one life so it can be pretty hard to fight all the mobs and get through the caves. Can you make it?

I decided to keep on working on the game so there will be updates soon! 

Follow me on Twitter for further information about the progress of the game:

https://twitter.com/smaex_official

Hope you enjoy it! :)

Smaex
